title: 1996년 Ensminger 사건
summary: 미국 North Dakota, ND 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Ensminger. 판결일: 1996-12-20. 법원: North Dakota Supreme Court.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: State v. Ensminger
**판결일**: 1996-12-20
**법원**: North Dakota Supreme Court
**관할**: North Dakota, ND


## 판결문 요약

Pulkrabek v. Sletten, 557 N.W.2d 225 (N.D. 1996)|N.D. Supreme Court|Pulkrabek v. Sletten, 557 N.W.2d 225 (N.D. 1996)[Go to Documents]Filed Dec. 20, 1996IN THE SUPREME COURTSTATE OF NORTH DAKOTABenjamin C. Pulkrabek, Plaintiff and Appellantv.Rolf P. Sletten, Defendant and AppelleeCivil No. 960042Appeal from the District Court for Burleigh County, South Central Judicial District, the Honorable Allan L. Schmalenberger, Judge.AFFIRMED.Opinion of the Court by Maring, Justice.Benjamin C. Pulkrabek (argued), Pro Se, 402 1st Street NW, Mandan, ND 58554, for plaintiff and appellant.Patrick W. Durick (argued), of Pearce & Durick, P.O. Box 400, Bismarck, ND 58502-0400, for defendant and appellee.Pulkrabek v. Sletten Civil No. 960042Maring, Justice.On January 31, 1996, judgment was entered in Burleigh County District Court dismissing Benjamin Pulkrabek's claims of libel and slander against Rolf Sletten. Pulkrabek appeals. We affirm the judgment.Benjamin Pulkrabek represented Dennis Houle in 1980 when Houle was charged with the murder of Sherri Collins. Houle pled guilty and received a fifty-year[557 N.W.2d 226]sentence at the State Penitentiary. Rolf Sletten was the Assistant State's Attorney involved in the prosecution and plea bargain negotiations. On September 7, 1994, the North Dakota Parole Board met and considered Houle's application for parole. Prior to this meeting, Houle wrote to Sletten, asking him to write a letter to the Parole Board on Houle's behalf, and Sletten did so....
